00040 #include <xdc/runtime/System.h>

00042 #include "string.h"

00045 // OPT Field specific defines
00046 #define OPT_SYNCDIM_SHIFT                   (0x00000002u)
00047 #define OPT_STATIC_SHIFT                    (0x00000003u)
00048 #define OPT_TCC_MASK                        (0x0003F000u)
00049 #define OPT_TCC_SHIFT                       (0x0000000Cu)
00050 #define OPT_TCCMODE_SHIFT                   (0x0000000Bu)
00051 #define OPT_ITCCHEN_SHIFT                   (0x00000017u)
00052 #define OPT_TCCHEN_SHIFT                    (0x00000016u)
00053 #define OPT_ITCINTEN_SHIFT                  (0x00000015u)
00054 #define OPT_TCINTEN_SHIFT                   (0x00000014u)
00055 
00056 // extern definitions used from EDMA3 LLD
00057 extern signed char*  getGlobalAddr(signed char* addr);
00058 extern unsigned short determineProcId();
00059 
00060 #define CACHELINESIZE  (128)
00061 
00062 #define STRUCT_EDMAXFER_LEN (sizeof(unsigned int)+sizeof(unsigned int)+sizeof(EDMA3_DRV_PaRAMRegs))
00063 
00064 typedef struct _EdmaXfer_ {
00066   volatile unsigned int chId;
00068   volatile unsigned int tcc;
00069   // param set used for this channel
00070   volatile EDMA3_DRV_PaRAMRegs paramSet;
00071   // for cache alignment
00072   char extra[(CACHELINESIZE*((STRUCT_EDMAXFER_LEN+CACHELINESIZE-1)/CACHELINESIZE))-STRUCT_EDMAXFER_LEN];
00073 } EdmaXfer_t;
00074 
00075 #define NUM_CORES 8
00076 #define BASE_CH   32
00077 // globally define this variable for use in this file
00078 #pragma DATA_SECTION(gEdmaXfer, ".dmaMem");
00079 volatile EdmaXfer_t gEdmaXfer[NUM_CORES][EDMA_CHANNELS];
00080 
00082 #pragma DATA_SECTION(gHEdma, ".dmaMem");
00083 volatile EDMA3_DRV_Handle gHEdma[2];
00084 
00085 // **************************************************************************************
00086 EDMA3_DRV_Result edmaInit(void)
00087 {
00088   EDMA3_DRV_Result edmaResult = EDMA3_DRV_SOK;
00089   int chCnt, coreCnt;
00090   extern EDMA3_DRV_InstanceInitConfig sampleInstInitConfig[][EDMA3_MAX_REGIONS];
00091 
00092   // modify the dma sample configuration so that DSP zero owns
00093   // channels from 32 to 49
00094   sampleInstInitConfig[1][0].ownDmaChannels[1]=0xFFFF;
00095   sampleInstInitConfig[1][0].ownTccs[1]=0xFFFF;
00096   sampleInstInitConfig[1][0].ownPaRAMSets[1]=0xFFFF;
00097   sampleInstInitConfig[2][0].ownDmaChannels[1]=0x0FFFF;
00098   sampleInstInitConfig[2][0].ownTccs[1]=0x0FFFF;
00099   sampleInstInitConfig[2][0].ownPaRAMSets[1]=0x0FFFF;
00100 
00101   memset(gEdmaXfer, 0, NUM_CORES*EDMA_CHANNELS*sizeof(EdmaXfer_t));
00102 
00103   // use EDMA instance #1
00104   gHEdma[0] = edma3init(1, &edmaResult);
00105   gHEdma[1] = edma3init(2, &edmaResult);
00106 
00107   for(coreCnt=0; coreCnt<NUM_CORES;coreCnt++)
00108   {
00109   for(chCnt = 0; chCnt < EDMA_CHANNELS; chCnt++) // initialize all channels
00110   {
00111         if (edmaResult == EDMA3_DRV_SOK)
00112         {
00113 
00114       if(chCnt==2)
00115       {
00116         // link channel
00117         gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].tcc = EDMA3_DRV_TCC_ANY;
00118         gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].chId = EDMA3_DRV_LINK_CHANNEL;
00119       }
00120       else
00121       {
00122         // fix channel id and corresponding tcc
00123         gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].tcc = BASE_CH+2*(coreCnt)+chCnt; //EDMA3_DRV_TCC_ANY;
00124         gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].chId = BASE_CH+2*(coreCnt)+chCnt; //EDMA3_DRV_DMA_CHANNEL_ANY;
00125       }
00126 
00127       // Request any DMA channel and any TCC
00128       // no callback function is registered, we will be polling
00129       edmaResult = EDMA3_DRV_requestChannel (gHEdma[coreCnt/4],
00130                                                      (unsigned int *) &gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].chId,
00131                                                      (unsigned int *) &gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].tcc,
00132                                              (EDMA3_RM_EventQueue) (coreCnt&3), // separate event queue for each core
00133                                              NULL, NULL);
00134 
00135       // Fill the PaRAM Set with transfer specific information
00136       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.srcAddr    = (unsigned int) NULL; // dummy
00137       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt]. paramSet.destAddr   = (unsigned int) NULL; // dummy
00138 
00139       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.srcBIdx    = 1;
00140       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.destBIdx   = 1;
00141       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.srcCIdx    = 1;
00142       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.destCIdx   = 1;
00143 
00144       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.aCnt       = 1;
00145       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.bCnt       = 1;
00146       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.cCnt       = 1;
00147 
00148       // For AB-synchronized transfers, BCNTRLD is not used.
00149       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.bCntReload = 0;
00150 
00151       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.linkAddr   = 0xFFFFu;
00152 
00153       // Src & Dest are in INCR modes
00154       //gEdmaXfer[chCnt].paramSet.opt &= 0xFFFFFFFCu;
00155       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.opt = 0x00000000u;
00156 
00157       // disable intermediate chaining
00158       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].paramSet.opt &= ~(1 << OPT_ITCCHEN_SHIFT);
00159       // disable final chaining
00160       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.opt &= ~(1 << OPT_TCCHEN_SHIFT);
00161       // disable intermediate interrupt
00162       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.opt &= ~(1 << OPT_ITCINTEN_SHIFT);
00163       // enable final interrupt
00164       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.opt |= (1 << OPT_TCINTEN_SHIFT);
00165       // set TCC
00166       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.opt |= ((gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].tcc << OPT_TCC_SHIFT) & OPT_TCC_MASK);
00167 
00168       // AB Sync Transfer Mode
00169       gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.opt |= (1 << OPT_SYNCDIM_SHIFT);
00170         }
00171   }
00172   }
00173 
00174   return(edmaResult);
00175 } // edmaInit()
00176 
00177 // **************************************************************************************
00178 EDMA3_DRV_Result edmaInitiateXfer(const void *dst, const void *src, const int aCnt,
00179                                                                            const int bCnt, const int cCnt, const int srcBIdx, 
00180                                                                            const int destBIdx, const int srcCIdx, 
00181                                                                            const int destCIdx, const int chCnt,
00182                                                                            const int flagXfer)
00183 {
00184   EDMA3_DRV_Result edmaResult = EDMA3_DRV_SOK;
00185   signed char *srcBuf, *dstBuf;
00186   volatile int coreCnt = determineProcId();
00187 
00188   srcBuf = (signed char*) getGlobalAddr((signed char *) src);
00189   dstBuf = (signed char*) getGlobalAddr((signed char *) dst);
00190 
00191   // set source address
00192   if(edmaResult == EDMA3_DRV_SOK)
00193   {
00194 
00195     gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.srcAddr  = (unsigned int) srcBuf;
00196     gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.destAddr = (unsigned int) dstBuf;
00197     gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.aCnt     = aCnt;
00198     gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.bCnt     = bCnt;
00199     gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.cCnt     = cCnt;
00200     gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.srcBIdx  = srcBIdx;
00201     gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.destBIdx = destBIdx;
00202     gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.srcCIdx  = srcCIdx;
00203     gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.destCIdx = destCIdx;
00204     // prevent a NULL transfer from being submitted; convert it into a dummy transfer
00205         if((aCnt==0) && (bCnt==0)) gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet.aCnt     = 1;
00206         /* Now, write the PaRAM Set. */
00207     edmaResult = EDMA3_DRV_setPaRAM(gHEdma[coreCnt/4], gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].chId, (EDMA3_DRV_PaRAMRegs *) &gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].paramSet);
00208   }
00209 
00210 
00211   // start transfer
00212   if(edmaResult == EDMA3_DRV_SOK)
00213   {
00214     if(flagXfer)
00215       {
00216       edmaResult = EDMA3_DRV_enableTransfer (gHEdma[coreCnt/4],
00217                                                        gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].chId,
00218                                                EDMA3_DRV_TRIG_MODE_MANUAL);
00219       }
00220   }      
00221   return(edmaResult);
00222 
00223 } // edmaInitiateXfer
00224 
00225 // ******************************************************************************************
00226 EDMA3_DRV_Result edmaClose(void)
00227 {
00228   EDMA3_DRV_Result edmaResult = EDMA3_DRV_SOK;
00229   int chCnt, coreCnt;
00230 
00231   for(coreCnt=0; coreCnt<NUM_CORES;coreCnt++)
00232   {
00233   for(chCnt = 0; chCnt < EDMA_CHANNELS; chCnt++)
00234     {
00235       // Free the previously allocated channel.
00236       edmaResult = EDMA3_DRV_freeChannel(gHEdma[coreCnt/4], gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt].chId);
00237     }
00238   }
00239   // deinit the handle
00240   edmaResult = edma3deinit(1, gHEdma[0]);
00241   edmaResult = edma3deinit(2, gHEdma[1]);
00242 
00243   // zero out memory
00244   memset(gEdmaXfer, 0, NUM_CORES*EDMA_CHANNELS*sizeof(EdmaXfer_t));
00245 
00246   return edmaResult;
00247 } // edmaClose
00248 
00249 // ******************************************************************************************
00250 EDMA3_DRV_Result edmaWait4Completion(const int chCnt)
00251 {
00252   EDMA3_DRV_Result edmaResult = EDMA3_DRV_SOK;
00253   volatile int coreCnt = determineProcId();
00254   volatile EdmaXfer_t *pEdmaXfer = (volatile EdmaXfer_t *) &gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][chCnt];
00255 
00256   // wait till DMA completes and clear the
00257   edmaResult = EDMA3_DRV_waitAndClearTcc(gHEdma[coreCnt/4], pEdmaXfer->chId);
00258   return edmaResult;
00259 
00260 } // edmaWait4Completion
00261 
00262 void edmaLinkXfer()
00263 {
00264   volatile int coreCnt = determineProcId();
00265 
00266   // link channel (0 to 2)
00267   EDMA3_DRV_linkChannel(gHEdma[coreCnt/4], gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].chId, gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].chId);
00268 
00269   // setup channel 0 params
00270   EDMA3_DRV_getPaRAM(gHEdma[coreCnt/4], gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].chId, (EDMA3_DRV_PaRAMRegs *) &gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].paramSet);
00271   //gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].tcc = gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].tcc;
00272   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].paramSet.opt |= ((gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].tcc << OPT_TCC_SHIFT) & OPT_TCC_MASK);
00273   // disable intermediate chain
00274   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].paramSet.opt &= ~(1 << OPT_ITCCHEN_SHIFT);
00275   // enable final chain
00276   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].paramSet.opt |= (1 << OPT_TCCHEN_SHIFT);
00277   // disable intermediate interrupt
00278   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].paramSet.opt &= ~(1 << OPT_ITCINTEN_SHIFT);
00279   // disable final interrupt
00280   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].paramSet.opt &= ~(1 << OPT_TCINTEN_SHIFT);
00281   // AB Sync Transfer Mode
00282   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].paramSet.opt |= (1 << OPT_SYNCDIM_SHIFT);
00283 
00284   // setup channel 2 params
00285   EDMA3_DRV_getPaRAM(gHEdma[coreCnt/4], gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].chId, (EDMA3_DRV_PaRAMRegs *) &gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].paramSet);
00286   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].tcc = gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].tcc;
00287   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].paramSet.opt |= ((gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].tcc << OPT_TCC_SHIFT) & OPT_TCC_MASK);
00288   // disable intermediate chain
00289   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].paramSet.opt &= ~(1 << OPT_ITCCHEN_SHIFT);
00290   // disable final chain
00291   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].paramSet.opt &= ~(1 << OPT_TCCHEN_SHIFT);
00292   // disable intermediate interrupt
00293   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].paramSet.opt &= ~(1 << OPT_ITCINTEN_SHIFT);
00294   // enable final interrupt
00295   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].paramSet.opt |= (1 << OPT_TCINTEN_SHIFT);
00296   // AB Sync Transfer Mode
00297   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].paramSet.opt |= (1 << OPT_SYNCDIM_SHIFT);
00298   // make it final transfer
00299   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].paramSet.linkAddr   = 0xFFFFu;
00300 
00301   return;
00302 }
00303 
00304 void edmaUnLinkXfer()
00305 {
00306   volatile int coreCnt = determineProcId();
00307 
00308   // remove link from channel 0
00309   EDMA3_DRV_unlinkChannel(gHEdma[coreCnt/4], gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].chId);
00310 
00311   // reset channel 0 param
00312   EDMA3_DRV_getPaRAM(gHEdma[coreCnt/4], gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].chId, (EDMA3_DRV_PaRAMRegs *) &gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].paramSet);
00313   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].paramSet.opt |= ((gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].tcc << OPT_TCC_SHIFT) & OPT_TCC_MASK);
00314   // disable intermediate chain
00315   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].paramSet.opt &= ~(1 << OPT_ITCCHEN_SHIFT);
00316   // disable final chain
00317   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].paramSet.opt &= ~(1 << OPT_TCCHEN_SHIFT);
00318   // disable intermediate interrupt
00319   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].paramSet.opt &= ~(1 << OPT_ITCINTEN_SHIFT);
00320   // enable final interrupt
00321   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].paramSet.opt |= (1 << OPT_TCINTEN_SHIFT);
00322   // AB Sync Transfer Mode
00323   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].paramSet.opt |= (1 << OPT_SYNCDIM_SHIFT);
00324   // make it final transfer
00325   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][0].paramSet.linkAddr   = 0xFFFFu;
00326 
00327   // reset channel 2 param
00328   EDMA3_DRV_getPaRAM(gHEdma[coreCnt/4], gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].chId, (EDMA3_DRV_PaRAMRegs *) &gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].paramSet);
00329   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].tcc = EDMA3_DRV_TCC_ANY;
00330   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].paramSet.opt |= ((gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].tcc << OPT_TCC_SHIFT) & OPT_TCC_MASK);
00331   // disable intermediate interrupt
00332   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].paramSet.opt &= ~(1 << OPT_ITCINTEN_SHIFT);
00333   // disable final interrupt
00334   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].paramSet.opt &= ~(1 << OPT_TCINTEN_SHIFT);
00335   // disable intermediate chain
00336   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].paramSet.opt &= ~(1 << OPT_ITCCHEN_SHIFT);
00337   // disable final chain
00338   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].paramSet.opt &= ~(1 << OPT_TCCHEN_SHIFT);
00339   // AB Sync Transfer Mode
00340   gEdmaXfer[coreCnt][2].paramSet.opt |= (1 << OPT_SYNCDIM_SHIFT);
00341 
00342   return;
00343 
00344 }
